    • Field Detail

      • waterTileRatio

        private final double waterTileRatio
        Constant value defining the ratio of water tiles to the total number of tiles in the map. For this map type 10% of all of the map tiles are set to be water tiles.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • minimumWinnableTiles

        private final double minimumWinnableTiles
        Defines the minimum percentage of tiles in the map from which a player needs to be able to reach the treasure. For this type of map at least 75% of tiles should be reachable
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicMap

        public BasicMap​(int n)
        Constructor used to initialize an empty BasicMap object. It uses the constructor of the Map super class.
        Parameters:
        n - size of the n x n square map
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the method is given an invalid size parameter (outside of the range 5-50)

      • BasicMap

        public BasicMap​(TileType[][] tiles)
        Constructor used to initialize a BasicMap object with a pre-generated map. It also uses the constructor of the Map super class.
        Parameters:
        tiles - Pre-generated 2D array of n x n tiles to be used in the map.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if tiles is null, empty or if the lists in the 2D array do not have the same lengths.

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Generates the tiles for the BasicMap object randomly.
        Specified by:
        generate in class Map
        API Note:
        Note that this function should also set the Map.treasurePos member so that it can be used later in the function Map.isPlayable().
        Implementation Note:
        The function generates one treasure tile and a number of water tiles according to waterTileRatio and the total number of tiles in the map. It also makes sure that none of the water tiles that are generated are placed adjacent to the treasure tile.

      • isNextToTreasureTile

        private boolean isNextToTreasureTile​(int x,
                                     int y)
        Helper function used to check if a tile at a specific coordinate is adjacent to a TileType.Treasure tile.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the tile to check
        y - y-coordinate of the tile to check
        Returns:
        returns true if the tile is next to a TileType.Treasure tile and false otherwise.

      • isPlayable

        public boolean isPlayable()
        Function to check if the player can reach the treasure starting from at least 75% of the grass tiles. The function also computes from which tiles the player can reach the treasure.
        Specified by:
        isPlayable in class Map
        Returns:
        true if the player can reach the treasure from at least 75% of the grass tiles and false otherwise.
        Implementation Note:
        The function carries out a Depth First Search (DFS) traversal of the map starting from the treasure tile to check which grass tiles are actually connected to the treasure tile. The function also creates an array of booleans (Map.winnableTiles) representing the tiles which are connected to the treasure tile. The elements of this array can be accessed using the Map.isPositionWinnable(Position) function.
